results.question: 1. resource calendar
results.correct_answer: b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
incorrect_answers: a. the maximum capacity of a resource to accomplish tasks
c. when and how much of a resource's time can be assigned to work on tasks
d. the people and equipment that do work to accomplish the tasks of the project

results.question: 2. Max. Units
results.correct_answer: h. a resource that doesn't depend on the amount of work on a task or the duration of a task
incorrect_answers: b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
d. the people and equipment that do work to accomplish the tasks of the project
e. the people, equipment, money, and materials used to complete the tasks in a project

results.question: 3. material resource
results.correct_answer: g. consumable items used up as the tasks in a project are accomplished
incorrect_answers: a. the maximum capacity of a resource to accomplish tasks
b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
i. the base calendar that provides default working times for an entire project

results.question: 4. project calendar
results.correct_answer: i. the base calendar that provides default working times for an entire project
incorrect_answers: b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
j. defines the working and nonworking time for an individual resource
f. a way of documenting information about resources, tasks, and assignments

results.question: 5. cost resource
results.correct_answer: e. the people, equipment, money, and materials used to complete the tasks in a project
incorrect_answers: b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
c. when and how much of a resource's time can be assigned to work on tasks
d. the people and equipment that do work to accomplish the tasks of the project

results.question: 6. work resource
results.correct_answer: a. way of documenting information about resources, tasks, and assignments
incorrect_answers: a. the maximum capacity of a resource to accomplish tasks
b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
e. the people, equipment, money, and materials used to complete the tasks in a project

results.question: 7. base calendar
results.correct_answer: j. defines the working and nonworking time for an individual resource
incorrect_answers: b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
c. when and how much of a resource's time can be assigned to work on tasks
h. a resource that doesn't depend on the amount of work on a task or the duration of a task

results.question: 8. availability
results.correct_answer: c. when and how much of a resource's time can be assigned to work on tasks
incorrect_answers: b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
d. the people and equipment that do work to accomplish the tasks of the project
e. the people, equipment, money, and materials used to complete the tasks in a project

results.question: 9. resources
results.correct_answer: d. the people and equipment that do work to accomplish the tasks of the project
incorrect_answers: a. the maximum capacity of a resource to accomplish tasks
b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
f. a way of documenting information about resources, tasks, and assignments

results.question: 10. note
results.correct_answer: f. a way of documenting information about resources, tasks, and assignments
incorrect_answers: a. the maximum capacity of a resource to accomplish tasks
b. specifies default working and nonworking times for a resource, a project, or a task
e. the people, equipment, money, and materials used to complete the tasks in a project

results.question: Which of the following is not an example of a work resource?
incorrect_answers: Yan Li
SD card
electrician

results.question: It is helpful to assign a base calendar to a group of resources when they all __________.
incorrect_answers: have the same pay rate
have the same Max. Units
do the same job function?

results.question: A resource calendar does not apply to which of the following?
incorrect_answers: people resources
equipment resources
work resources

results.question: In which of the following views can you view information for the individual people who will perform the tasks on the project?
incorrect_answers: Calendar view
Gantt Chart view
Network Diagram view

results.question: You can provide additional information about how a resource is scheduled by doing which of the following?
incorrect_answers: changing the Max. Units
establishing a project calendar
setting constraints

results.question: For which resource is the standard rate listed per tracking unit of consumption?
incorrect_answers: material
equipment
people

results.question: If you have four electricians whom can each work part‐time (4 hours rather than 8), which of the following values should you assign to Max. Units for the resource “electrician”?
If you assign a base calendar to a resource, which of the following is true?
results.correct_answer: The base calendar gives the basic days/hours for the resource, but the resource's calendar can have exceptions to those days/hours.
incorrect_answers: The base calendar dictates the resource's vacation days.
The base calendar gives all the available time to work on the project.
The resource calendar contains all nonworking days for the entire project.

results.question: To add vacation days to the calendar for an individual work resource, which dialog box would you use?
incorrect_answers: Resource Information
Resource Notes
none of the above

results.question: Which of the following is a reason why it is often difficult to get cost information for people resources?
incorrect_answers: The information is too complex to calculate.
The information changes too frequently.
The costs are large in comparison with other resource costs.
